Title: Aid of Mirkwood II
Text:
Legolas is in the guest room to the west of the library Elrond is at..

Master Elrond has told you of an Elf-prince named Legolas, currently staying in Imladris for a time. He hails from Mirkwood and may have some knowledge of the creature you faced in the Trollshaws.
CompleteText: Hail to you, @p. If you did not bring such dire news I would greet you more heartily, but your tidings are troubling.
